channel.title: Need help on client
channel.description: everytime i upload my own client it says requesting title screen retryin connection error 5 or 10 :mad: how can i fix i will make some 1 a admin on my server please tell me!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Need help on client
item.dc:creator: @uop81 uop81
item.description:
@uop81 wrote:

1.click your picture and on the side of your screen where it shows the picture it will say the type like BIT image or PNG image

2.go to the file:
class30_sub2_sub1_sub1

3.look for image image =
make it look like this

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage(“Nameofpicture.typeofpicture”);

heres a example ;D

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage(“server.png”);

Read full topic
